description: BrokerTemplateInstanceSpec describes the state of a BrokerTemplateInstance.

bindingIDs.description: bindingids is a list of 'binding_id's provided during successive bind calls to the template service broker.

secret.description: secret is a reference to a Secret object residing in a namespace, containing the necessary template parameters.

templateInstance.description: templateinstance is a reference to a TemplateInstance object residing in a namespace.
